author: epCode
long_description:
This mod adds asthetic particles when a node is placed and adds more than are normaly generated when punching a node.
Either the **place particles** or the **punch particles** can be disabled in the settings if you only want the effect of one.


This is purely decoration and effects the gameplay in no way.
name: punch_and_place_particles
short_description: Makes satisfying particles when placing a node or punching one. (viewable by all players)
title: Punch And Place Particles
